Developer ReferenceÂ¶

The intended audience of this guide is mainly to developers who use skewTplus. It also serves as a more comprehesive description of the packages modules. For a more general introduction aimed at users see the User Reference.

This guide provides documentation for all modules, function, methods, and classes within SkewTplus both those in the public API and private members.

Documentation is broken down by module (in order of relevance)

  • SkewTplus.sounding module
  • SkewTplus.skewT module
  • SkewTplus.thermodynamics module
  • SkewTplus._thermodynamics module
  • SkewTplus.errorHandling module
